message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you first at a price of $14,000. I think it will be very valuable for you, even more so than my initial asking price.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. Can we meet in the middle?
I appreciate your offer, Bob, but $10,000 is too low for me.  How about we split the difference and settle at $12,000?
I'm still interested in the product, but $12,000 is still a bit too high for me. How about we meet in the middle at $9,500?
